# Introducing BlackFlag HD - Heavy Duty ECU Diagnostics

**Professional ECU Diagnostic & Tuning Suite for Commercial Vehicles**

## Overview

BlackFlag HD brings professional-grade ECU diagnostics to the heavy-duty market. Designed for Class 4-8 commercial vehicles, including semi trucks, buses, construction equipment, and agricultural machinery.

## Supported Vehicle Classes

| Class | GVWR | Examples |
|:-----:|------|----------|
| 4 | 14,001-16,000 lbs | Ford F-450, Ram 4500 |
| 5 | 16,001-19,500 lbs | Ford F-550, Ram 5500 |
| 6 | 19,501-26,000 lbs | Freightliner M2 106 |
| 7 | 26,001-33,000 lbs | Kenworth T370, Peterbilt 337 |
| 8 | 33,001+ lbs | Kenworth T680, Peterbilt 579, Volvo VNL |

## Key Features

### Protocol Support
- **J1939 CAN** - SAE J1939 for HD diesel engines (250 kbps)
- **J1708/J1587** - Legacy serial protocol
- **ISO 15765** - OBD-II compliant systems
- **Proprietary** - Cummins, Detroit, PACCAR, Volvo

### Diagnostic Capabilities
- Read/Clear DTCs (Active & Inactive)
- Live data streaming (250+ parameters)
- DPF regeneration commands
- SCR/DEF system monitoring
- Injector coding
- Aftertreatment diagnostics

### Fleet Management
- Multi-vehicle scanning
- VIN decoding
- Odometer verification
- Trip data export

## Supported Manufacturers

**Trucks:**
- Freightliner (Cascadia, M2, 122SD)
- Kenworth (T680, T880, W990)
- Peterbilt (579, 389, 567)
- Volvo (VNL, VNR, VHD)
- Mack (Anthem, Pinnacle, Granite)
- International (LT, HX, MV)
- Western Star (4900, 5700, 49X)

**Engines:**
- Cummins (ISB, ISL, ISX, X15)
- Detroit Diesel (DD13, DD15, DD16)
- PACCAR (MX-11, MX-13, PX-7, PX-9)
- Navistar (A26, MaxxForce)
- Caterpillar (C7, C9, C13, C15)

**Also Supports:**
- School & Transit Buses
- Construction Equipment (CAT, Komatsu, John Deere)
- Agricultural Machinery (John Deere, Case IH, New Holland)

## Documentation Included

- Complete J1939 protocol reference
- 9-pin & 6-pin Deutsch connector pinouts
- Caterpillar, John Deere, Cummins, Volvo specific connectors
- FMI/SPN fault code reference

## Get Started

```bash
git clone https://github.com/bad-antics/blackflag-hd.git
```

- [BlackFlag ECU](https://github.com/bad-antics/blackflag-ecu) - Light duty automotive tuning (200+ vehicles)
- [NullSec Tools](https://github.com/bad-antics/nullsec-tools) - Security research utilities
